import { useState } from "react" const containerStyle={ display : "flex", alignItems : "center", gap : "16px" } const starContainerStyle = { display : "flex", gap : "8px" } export default function Stars({MaxRating = 5}){ const [rating , setRaiting] = useState(0); const [tempRating , setTempRating] = useState(0) function handleRating(rating){ setRaiting(rating) } return(
{Array.from({length : MaxRating} , (_ , i)=>( handleRating(i + 1)} key={i} full ={tempRating?tempRating>=i+1:rating>= i+1} enterMouse ={()=> setTempRating(i+1)} leaveMouse ={()=> setTempRating(0)} />))}

{tempRating || rating || ""}

) } const starStyle = { width : "48px", height : "48px", display : "block", cursor : "pointer" } function Star({onRate , full , enterMouse , leaveMouse}){ return( { full ? : } ) }
